welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc1: Get rewarded for shopping at your favorite stores. Earn cashback with every transaction, both online and in-store.
welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc2: Browse through thousands of stores offering special deals, coupons, and discounts just for you.
welcomeScreens.welcomeDesc3: Easily monitor your cashback balance and redeem your earnings through PayPal or other options

verificationScreen.heading: Enter your Verification Code
verificationScreen.sentDesc: We send verification code to your email
verificationScreen.didNotReceive: I didn’t received the code? Send again

forgotPassword.heading: Don’t worry. Enter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.

emailSent.heading: Your email is on the way
emailSent.description: Check your email test@test.com and follow the instructions to reset your password

dealsDetails.description1: Starbucks is a global coffee company and coffeehouse chain based in Seattle, Washington. Founded in 1971, it has grown to become the largest coffeehouse chain in the world, with over 30,000 locations globally. Starbucks is renowned for its high-quality coffee, including espresso-based drinks, brewed coffee, teas, pastries, and other snacks.
dealsDetails.description2: The company’s mission is to inspire and nurture the human spirit—one person, one cup, and one neighborhood at a time. Starbucks places a strong emphasis on ethical sourcing, sustainability, and community involvement, ensuring that its coffee is responsibly sourced and its stores foster a welcoming environment for customers.
